blogs.title: My first Name
blogs.body: In this article, I have included a whole load of blog examples from a wide variety of different niches, all run on different blogging platforms like WordPress, Joomla! and Drupal.
blogs.author: mario

blogs.title: Opening party!
blogs.body: Each example listed in this blog post are all different in some way and all bring something unique to their readers & subscribers. I want to show you what is possible and how you can take inspiration from them and create an awesome blog of your own.
blogs.author: yoshi
